column4: hey, how come i can't find an ffmpeg package on medibuntu? how do i install ffmpeg with support for mp3 encoding?
not sure about mediabuntu package, but you can compile it from source, or just use lame for mp3 encoding
i tried that, it was a mess. i couldn't get mplayer to install from repositories or anything, and all my gstreamer plugins were broken
i'm trying to get this working for cinerella
